title: Best of: Differently Abled Sex with Andrew Gurza
itunes:title: Best of: Differently Abled Sex with Andrew Gurza
itunes:subtitle: In honor of Pride month, on today’s throwback podcast, Dr. Emily is joined by host of the Disability After Dark podcast Andrew Gurza to talk about how to overcome insecurities and gain confidence in the bedroom, no matter what’s holding you back....
description:
In honor of Pride month, on today’s throwback podcast, Dr. Emily is joined by host of the Disability After Dark podcast Andrew Gurza to talk about how to overcome insecurities and gain confidence in the bedroom, no matter what’s holding you back.

They dive into what it means to be a “queer cripple,” and ways to make sex with disabilities as hot and pleasurable as possible. Plus, how to make oral sex and masturbation as comfortable as possible – including sex toys with disability in mind.


For more information about Andrew Gurza, visit: https://www.andrewgurza.com/

For even more sex advice, tips, and tricks visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
